properties.name: wb-cloud.sign.enabled
properties.description: enable or disable sign auto configure.

properties.name: wb-cloud.sign.ebao.projectId
properties.description: the sign e bao project id.

properties.name: wb-cloud.sign.ebao.projectSecret
properties.description: the sign e bao project secret.

properties.name: wb-cloud.sign.ebao.apisUrl
properties.description: the sign e bao apis url.

properties.name: wb-cloud.sign.ebao.config.algorithm
properties.description: the sign e bao config algorithm.

properties.name: wb-cloud.sign.ebao.httConfig.proxyIp
properties.description: the sign e bao http config proxy ip.

properties.name: wb-cloud.sign.ebao.httConfig.proxyPort
properties.description: the sign e bao http config proxy port.

properties.name: wb-cloud.sign.ebao.httConfig.httpType
properties.description: the sign e bao http config http type.

properties.name: wb-cloud.sign.ebao.httConfig.retry
properties.description: the sign e bao http config retry.

properties.name: wb-cloud.sign.ebao.httConfig.timeoutConnect
properties.description: the sign e bao http timeout connect.

properties.name: wb-cloud.sign.ebao.httConfig.timeoutRequest
properties.description: the sign e bao http timeout request.

properties.name: wb-cloud.sign.ebao.httConfig.username
properties.description: the sign e bao http username.

properties.name: wb-cloud.sign.ebao.httConfig.password
properties.description: the sign e bao http password.
